captions.text: Hey guys.
This is Krepo and welcome to the EG House Tour.
We like you HyperX but even you guys need to stick to the rules.
So Rule #1 is: Take off your shoes.  Let's get started.
First off, we play a lot of video games.  But sometimes we just wanna chill. And how to do that? Play some more video games.
This is the Smash Room.
This is were the young ones play Smash Bros.
And Grandpa Krepo gets to watch because I'm really bad at the game.  I'll just let them kick ass.
If you follow me I'll show you the rest of the house.
Well, and this is where we spend most of our days. 5 PCs set up.  Here we have Tyson sitting.  He gets the 1st seat. Next is Yellopeat.
At the head of the table me my buddy Amumu are, a, kicking ass.
Steve in the corner here.  Steve, say hello.
And has you see there is one empy desk.
Sadly Pobelter doesn't live with us yet but he will be soon.  So this will be filled.
If you head over to the kitchen next to the gamming room.
We have a kickass fridge filled with delicious stuff such as Monster and eggs.
The same eggs you may remember from the music video.
This is where manager Brian does most of the cooking, actually.
Takes care of the lunch and dinner for us.
We tend to overuse this toaster.
We do like our daily bread.
If we eat lunch we try to do it here.
We try to avoid eating at our PCs.
Keep it a little tidy.  Really nice.  A lot of light.  I like it so far.
I showed you the inside.  Now I'll show you the outside.
Right across the kitchen is our sparring area.
A little pantry here.  If we ever run our Monster we have some more Monster.  They keep us well supplied.
Not only is our dryer and washer pretty big, they also make fun noises.
Cool to toy around with.
And this is basically where we spend our Sunday nights after LCS.
We are usually to tired of playing more, so we invited some of the other LCS teams over.
There's one more room downstairs right now and that’s where the king sits.
They call him "I am Guitar" but I have no idea why.
We just saw the downstairs.  Let's check out the upstairs.
First stop we have what we call the Monster Lounge.
And this is where we check out replays and watch some movies once in a while.
Got these comfy bean bags.  I’m not gonna lie.  They are pretty comfortable.
This is why you will always find one of us lying down here.
Let me show you the bedrooms right now.
Cleaned up, efficient, nicely spaced, and a German flag.  None other than Yellopete right here.
Pete actually has the worst room out of all of us.
I'll show you the other ones.
We do share a bathroom.  So this is where me and Pete shower.  Hopefully not at the same time.
It gets a little awkward then.
And this is my room.  We had the shortest straws so we ended up in these rooms.
But I'm still very happy.  I don't spend too much time here.  Just sleeping most of the time.
Stephen got a little luckier.  He got little bit of a better of a room
Let's see if he's there.
It dosen't look like he is.  It looks like he borrowed my book.  I like that we share this between team mates.
He has is collection of stuffed animals.  And a check from OGN.  He won 2nd place there.
We did better than we did this split, sadly enough.
But then we can show you the master bedroom.  You could probably house a small family in here.
And Tyson had the longest straw.
He won the race and the competition and got this master bedroom.
Kickass bed.  Sporting a Canadian flag, representing.
The best part about this room is the bathroom. The reason I love so much is that it has a kickass bed.
I actually have permission to use it once in a while.
So occasionally he'll find me here. Chilling in the bed.
This room, it's a little creepy, I'm not gonna lie.  But this is where we end up stuffing Eugene using once he gets here.
He had the shortest straw of so he ends up living in the closet.
Well, we showed you upstairs.  We showed you downstairs.
That pretty much makes it a wrap.  Thank you guys for coming out.  Dudes, where's you manners?
Bye HyperX.
Clear!  Clear! You have to keep the pads on!
Oh man, your chest is just too much work!

title: Evil Geniuses | HyperX Gaming House Tour | LA Edition
